scripts.translate:es: npx lingo.dev@latest translate messages/en.json --to es --output messages/es.json
scripts.translate:fr: npx lingo.dev@latest translate messages/en.json --to fr --output messages/fr.json
scripts.translate:de: npx lingo.dev@latest translate messages/en.json --to de --output messages/de.json
scripts.translate:it: npx lingo.dev@latest translate messages/en.json --to it --output messages/it.json
scripts.translate:all: npm run translate:es && npm run translate:fr && npm run translate:de && npm run translate:it
